description: Explore Lake Louise, one of Canada’s most beautiful hiking destinations. Discover trails along the shore of alpine lakes, to backcountry tea houses, through stands of golden larch and to lofty mountain viewpoints. Hike through wildflower meadows, glacier-carved valleys and wildlife-rich forests. Lake Louise Hiking Guide includes descriptions of all Lake Louise and Moraine Lake hiking trails, plus interesting side trips, colour maps and photography, as well as tips on how to prepare for hiking in the Canadian Rockies.
name: Lake Louise Hiking Guide
